ficiency
What are the treatments for 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-CoA lyase deficiency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of HMG-CoA lyase deficiency:  - Baby's First Test  - Genetic Testing Registry: Deficiency of hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA lyase   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,3-hydr
